H0.text: Who became US President John Kennedy’s Vice President in 1961. Hubert Humphrey

H1.text: Who became US President John Kennedy’s Vice President in 1961. Adlai Stevenson

H2.text: Who became US President John Kennedy’s Vice President in 1961. Stuart Symington

H3.text: Who became US President John Kennedy’s Vice President in 1961. LBJ

A5.text: Vice President Johnson assumed the presidency in 1963, after President Kennedy was assassinated.
